name: ETERNAL BLOOD
description:
Your spirit and skill will be tested. ETERNAL BLOOD is a fast-paced shooter that places you in an arena to face legions of demons. Armed with dark magic and a fluid movement system, fight to become a God of Destruction.

Key Features:
• Fast-paced gameplay.
• 5 large arenas.
• Nightmarish post apocalyptic atmosphere.
• Face terrifying enemies each of which has its own unique abilities.
• Harvest demonic souls to increase the power of your dark magic.
• Awesome soundtrack.
